hero.title: Assets
hero.lede: Overview of our core producing fields and key projects.

items.name: Tyra
items.summary: Flagship redevelopment and key gas hub in the Danish North Sea.

items.name: Halfdan
items.summary: Large producing complex focused on infill drilling and optimisation.

items.name: Dan
items.summary: Mature field with ongoing brownfield work and recovery improvements.
overview: The Dan field was discovered in 1971 and brought on production in 1972.
It has been developed in several phases and has of a total of 12 platforms,
38 active oil wells and 33 active water injectors.
Oil production from Dan is transported to Gorm while gas is transported to Tyra.

items.name: Gorm
items.summary: Key offshore hub in the Danish North Sea.
